title: Crime Alert 03..23.22
itunes:title: Crime Alert 03..23.22
description:
Man tells police he thought the woman he just punched in the face was his wife. Mom tells cops she hasn't been drinking and driving. 9-year-old son reminds her, "you can't lie to the police."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
